name: nightingale
description: Logger for browser and node, see [nightingale](packages/nightingale) to get started !
author: Christophe Hurpeau <christophe@hurpeau.com> (https://christophe.hurpeau.com)

scripts.postbuild: yarn run build:definitions && yarn run generate:docs
scripts.preversion: yarn run lint --since && yarn run build --since -- -- --no-clean && repository-check-dirty
scripts.release: cross-env GH_TOKEN=$POB_GITHUB_TOKEN lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate --create-release=github -m 'chore: release' && lerna publish from-git
